message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper discusses reinforcement learning approaches for goal-directed tasks, which are commonly studied in the sub-fields of machine learning and robotics. The use of Hindsight Learning approaches is a popular method for training agents to perform these tasks, which falls under the category of reinforcement learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper focuses on implementing these approaches in robotic tasks, which falls under the sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses prioritized variants of the Hindsight Experience Replay algorithm, which is a popular method for improving learning in reinforcement learning, and this falls under the sub-categories of cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
